publisher.publisher-name: The Department of Plant Taxonomy and Ecology, L. Eötvös University

title-group.article-title: A procedure for structuring vegetation tables

permissions.copyright-statement: © Department of Plant Taxonomy and Ecology, ELTE

abstract.p: A semiautomatic procedure is proposed as a helpful tool for structuring vegetation data tables. Data analysis and typical procedures used for this purpose are discussed in the context of the theoretical steps involved, and an example is shown.
